thread.title: Stuart Caplan
thread.title_full: Rush Hair and Beauty reviewed by Stuart Caplan

author: Stuart Caplan
title: Stuart Caplan
text: My hairdresser of many years has decided to give up working so I was looking around for somewhere to get a good haircut locally. My wife had her hair cut at Rush on Baker Street and she recommended I try them on the basis that even if it doesn't work out I'm never more than five weeks from the next haircut. I called late on a Friday and got to see Erica on the following Sunday. I was greeted by a friendly receptionist who took my coat and offered a drink. Erica discussed my hair with me and asked how I liked it. She backwashed my hair and gave me a superb haircut using only scissors. When she finished she explained what she had done and asked if I was happy. I was more than happy, I was delighted. If you are looking for great service and superb haircut somewhere in central London I can recommend Rush on Baker Street.
